de.scrubstudios.srvmon.director

Class DB

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.scrubstudios.srvmon.director.DB

  • public class DB
extends java.lang.Object
    Database class for the SRVMON DIRECTOR - UPDATER. Contains all database functions which are needed for the updater.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pol Warnimont

    • Method Detail

      • getHostsFromDB

        public java.util.ArrayList<Host> getHostsFromDB()
        This method is needed to retrieve a list of all the available hosts from the database.
        Returns:
        Returns an arraylist with all the available hosts.

      • setHostStatus

        public void setHostStatus(int id,
                 boolean status)
        This method can set the online status of a host.
        Parameters:
        id - Internal ID number of the host.
        status - New status for the host. False = OFFLINE and TRUE = ONLINE.

      • disableChildrenForHost

        public void disableChildrenForHost(int id)
        This method disables all children hosts of the given parent host. The service checks are also set to UNREACHABLE.
        Parameters:
        id - Internal ID number of the parent host.
